While lying on the ground, Tucson picks up Lord Elder's transmission.

" I =
copy that, Lord Elder... I know just the thing too.  By the way, I need you=
 to activate a holographic field on me.  As far as Hydras knows, Night Shif=
t has mutilated me to the point of irecognizable proportions.  I need a hol=
ogram of me in a dismantled state of being.  That should also draw out who'=
s hiding behind the cloaked field.  Tucson out."

Night Shift holds onto th=
e rear view mirror as he looks to Tucson.

" Psst, you're - not gonna hold =
a grudge against me for this are ya?"

Tucson shakes his head no.

"Shhh...=
  The less they know the better. So far you're doing great.. But we are goi=
ng to have another sparring match eventually, and when that happens, you're=
 going to lose."

Night Shift cringes.

"Slag, that means you're gonna lemm=
e have it."

Tucson narrows his brow.

"Bet your rotten aft I am.. All righ=
t, now, concentrate on what's important.  Right now you've beaten the slag =
out of me, and you need to bring a trophy back to Hydras.  But first....

H=
e shoots an arrow into Night Shift's knee!

"AHHHHHH!  WHAT THE PIT?!  SLAG=
 YOU!"

"THAT'S FOR UNDERSETIMATING ME!"

Night Shift bears down hard on Tu=
cson as Tucson now reveals that he has no Matrix inside him.

"You lyn' son=
 of a glitch! Just wait till I get back ta Hydras! You're gonna tell me whe=
re that Matrix is or else I'm gonna finish the job here'n now!"

Tucson giv=
es Night Shift a cold look.

" Go ahead, you'll never find it if you do."

=
Without warning, a second arrow is shot into Night Shift's right thigh!

"A=
HHHH!!!"

Tucson acts the part and plays possum out on the field, just as h=
e has finished putting a few "Pointers" into Night Shift's intentions.  Nig=
ht Shift limps away, still with the rear view mirror in hand.

"Slag, he di=
dn't have ta go that far.."

He limps with his right and left legs impailed=
 by arrows, also hindering him from transforming.
